InstructionData.Title: Breathable Air Mixer
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Breathable Air Mixer # https://github.com/dtandersen/sta alias GasSensor d0 alias O2Supply d1 alias N2Supply d2 alias Unused d3 alias Unused d4 alias Unused d5
alias device r0 # device to control alias partial r1 # partial pressure alias ratio r2 # ratio of gas in room alias pressure r3 # room pressure alias poweron r4 alias setpoint r5 alias temp1 r9 alias temp2 r10 alias temp3 r11 alias error r14 alias rate r15
define maxPressure 1000 define o2Target 0.21 define n2Target 0.79 define kp 2
init: s GasSensor On 1 s GasSensor Lock 1
start: l pressure GasSensor Pressure bgt pressure maxPressure overpressure
# oxygen regulation mul setpoint o2Target maxPressure l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen jal sanitize mul partial ratio pressure jal calcpid s db Setting partial move device 1 jal setpump
# nitrogen regulation mul setpoint n2Target maxPressure l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen jal sanitize mul partial ratio pressure jal calcpid move device 2 jal setpump done: yield j start
overpressure: s O2Supply On 0 s N2Supply On 0 j done
calcpid: # global: sp, partial, kp sub error setpoint partial mul rate kp error # global rate j ra
setpump: # global: rate - pid output # global: pressure/maxPressure sgtz temp1 rate # rate > 0 slt temp2 pressure maxPressure # pressure < max and poweron temp1 temp2 bdns dr0 nodevice s dr0 On poweron s dr0 Setting rate nodevice: j ra
sanitize: bgtz pressure ra move ratio 0 j ra
